episodes.synopsis: Two companies of British riflemen and machine gunners have just arrived in Belgium when they're ordered to demolish 18 bridges in the town of Mons.
episodes.title: The First Day

episodes.synopsis: Paddy, a soldier in one of the British Pals regiments fighting the Germans, is put in the horrible position.
episodes.title: Pals

episodes.synopsis: In 1918, a British crew operating a new tank called the Niveleur prepares for an offensive attack against the Germans near the French town of Amiens.
episodes.title: War Machine

video.title: Our World War
video.synopsis: During World War I, British troops face the horrors of the Battle of Mons in 1914, internal strife in 1916 and innovative tank warfare in 1918.
